document_data.mainbody:
Nadira was a tiefling from Elturel that ventured to the Sword Coast with many of her kin following the Descent in the late 15 century DR.
At some point in her life, Nadira came into possession of a soul coin that she "won fair and square" from an erinyes.
She spent some of her time peering through a telescope set up atop a rocky bluff overlooking her home.
Nadira was among the tiefling community staying at the Emerald Grove following her peoples exile from Elturel in the . At some point she became the target of assassination by a particularly fearsome bugbear, likely tasked with recovering her soul coin.
